QuestData.Title: Malygos Must Die!
QuestData.Description: Our resources are strained. Malygos, the Spell-Weaver, is draining all of the magic out of the world, consolidating it in the Eye of Eternity. Without magic, we are doomed.$B$B$C, the Nexus War must be brought to an end. The Council of Six has decreed that Malygos must die!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Malygos.$B$BThis quest can be completed with any difficulty or size raid.
QuestData.RewardText: With Malygos defeated, the Nexus War should come to a swift conclusion. You have the gratitude of the Kirin Tor, $N.
